meanings.definition: The act of editing or revising a publication for a new edition.
meanings.sent1: The reeditions of the book involved updating the cover and fixing typos.
meanings.sent2: I bought the reeditions of my favorite novels to have the latest versions.
meanings.sent3: The reeditions of the magazine were so popular that they sold out quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her reeditions of the recipes added a fresh flavor to the cookbook.
meanings.sent5: The reeditions of the newspaper brought new life to the stories.

meanings.definition: A new edition of a previously published work.
meanings.sent1: The bookstore displayed the reeditions of classic novels in a special section.
meanings.sent2: I received the reeditions of the magazine as a gift from a friend.
meanings.sent3: The reeditions of the comic book series made the characters look different.
meanings.sent4: The reeditions of the textbook had updated information for students.
meanings.sent5: The reeditions of the dictionary included new words and definitions.
